input: Tell me about Gopal's experience.
output:
Gopal is a skilled professional with hands-on experience in software development, data science, and AI/ML applications. His expertise spans Python, C++, JavaScript, and tools like PySpark, SQL, and MongoDB, allowing him to develop robust data pipelines, integrate large datasets, and create scalable solutions.

In his freelance work, Gopal developed a healthcare website for early Alzheimer's detection, utilizing Python and AWS services to design ETL workflows and implement automated data transformation processes. He effectively merged structured and unstructured medical data, built monitoring dashboards, and deployed the solution on AWS infrastructure.

At L&T Precision Engineering, where he interned, Gopal worked on the C-driven multilingual offline translator project for DRDO. He contributed by creating efficient ETL pipelines using PySpark, processing multilingual datasets, and optimizing data structures in C for embedded systems. He also improved model accuracy by 80% and collaborated with embedded systems engineers to ensure optimal performance in resource-constrained environments.

His technical skills also include web development with the MERN stack, AI/ML technologies like TensorFlow and PyTorch, cloud computing on AWS and Azure, and database management using MongoDB and SQL. Gopal has also worked with embedded systems, circuit design, and microcontrollers, further expanding his technical versatility.
